types.html:
sortir le champagne

  1. (figuratively) to break out the bubbly, to crack open the bubbly, to bring out the champagne (to open a bottle of champagne in order to celebrate)
    Synonym: sabler le champagne
trans: to break out the bubbly, to crack open the bubbly, to bring out the champagne
to break out the bubbly, to crack open the bubbly, to bring out the champagne

title: sortir le champagne
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /sɔʁ.tiʁ lə ʃɑ̃.paɲ/
